body.p: The Admin Command Manager ensures that only one admin command is processed at a time by masking the inbound IPC ports used to receive admin commands from other managers once an admin command has been received. The Admin Command Manager is still able to receive completions to admin requests it issues to other managers via a second inbound IPC port used solely for admin request completions. When a received admin command has been successfully processed, the inbound IPC ports are unmasked, allowing the reception of a new admin command.
